de.lessvoid.nifty.node

Class AlignmentLayoutChildNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.node.AlignmentLayoutChildNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NiftyNode

    public final class AlignmentLayoutChildNode
extends Object
implements NiftyNode
    This is the child node for AlignmentLayoutNode. It allows setting the alignment that is supposed to be applied to this node. In both orientations there is a special "stretch" alignment that will expand the node to the full size of the parent. All other alignment options will honor the desired sizes of the children.
    Author:
    Martin Karing <nitram@illarion.org>
